title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, November 18, 2019
description: Today is the 80th birthday of the author of Margaret Atwood, author of “The Handmaid's Tale,” in which she wrote: “Don't let the bastards grind you down.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the 80th birthday of the author of Margaret Atwood, author of “The Handmaid's Tale,” in which she wrote: “Don't let the bastards grind you down.”
